game_description: Welcome to Lucky Fish Bread! In this cooking simulation, you will be baking Fish Bread in a street food stall with the help of the Fish Bread Fairies. Prepare Fish Bread and drinks to order for your hungry customers. Complete the game's missions! Upgrade your stats and cooking equipment! Befriend other Fish Bread Fairies and learn their Fish Bread recipes! Features : *Pick up and interact with all kinds of objects around you. There is more to the game besides cooking Fish Bread! *Enjoy the unique, cartoony art style, and make colorful and animated Fish Bread snacks. *Interact with cute Fish Bread Fairies. *Complete the game missions and engage in funny cutscenes with the Fish Bread Fairies. *Sell Fish Bread and develop your business. Make your street stall the most popular stop in downtown! Satisfy your impatient customers. Keep troublemakers away from your business. Become a master Fish Bread Chef. Do you have what it takes?
review_1: I CONTACTED THE COMPANY THROUGH EMAIL LAST MONTH ABOUT THE ISSUES AND THEY REPLIED IT WOULD BE FIXED. AN UPDATE CAME AND ITâ€™S FIXED!! THIS IS MY FAVORITE GAME I LOVE IT SO MUCH! Thank you so much for replying and fixing it.
review_2: I love this gameplay. However, the game crashes whenever Beanie the magical fish bread fairy waves his wand. I would love to play it, so if this bug ever gets fixed, I will adjust the review happily.
review_3: themetamanVR here! I find this game to be fun, challenging and very rewarding! Also, Korean. If you like games based on time management, rewards, food and drink, this game is for you!
review_4: Adorable game! Pros: + Funny plot and awesome characters + Amazing atmosphere + Fantastic combination of mechanics + It is both challenging and calming + Simple but cozy graphic design + Upgrades Cons: - It takes a while to set the hight and your position inside the shop during sitting playing. I recommend it to everyone, one of my fav VR games so far
review_5: So fun. It gets so challenging and quite frantic, it feels a lot like actual food service, with less of the nitty gritty. I actually love these fish cakes in real life and highly recommend them!
